abilities.name: Self Healing
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Lightning Energy card from your hand to Jolteon, remove all Special Conditions affecting Jolteon.

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderspark
attacks.effect: This attack does 10 damage to each Benched Pokémon with at least 1 Energy card attached to it (yours and your opponent's).
